attributes.action: Closers to all construction site with immediate effect due to COVID.19 epidemic
attributes.additional_details: Close all construction sites to save lives and stop the spreading off COVID.19 and to help employed and self employed people to receive a respectable wage/ salaries
attributes.background: I want all sites in England and Wales to close with immediate effect to stop the spreading  off COVID.19 and to ensure all workers receive help from employer and government with there salaries/ wages
